module.name: document_definition
module.keywords: module, document definition, physical document definition, digital document definition
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of a document version in a digital or physical format.

inscope.li: definition of a document version in a digital format such as an electronic file;
definition of a document version in a non-digital format such as paper copy;
specification of the data locating the components of a in a digital or physical storage system.

uof.name: Document_Definition
uof.description: The Document_Definition UoF specifies the data structure for the description of a document version in different formats.
